text: Chandpur Children's Academy is a primary school with upper primary, secondary and higher secondary grades in Chandpur village, Malda district, West Bengal, India. ==History== The school was established in 1995 and founded by Abdus Samad and Mortuja Ali. ==Now== A Bengali Medium Co-Educational School, Chandpur Children's Academy consists of Lower Nursery through Tenth grade. Management of the school is private and unaided. The school has its own (private) building with 10 classrooms, 15 male teachers, 2 female teachers, a playground, a Mosque and a library. The library facility has a collection of 150 books. Chandpur Children's Academy provides hostel (আবাস) facilities for boy and girls students. ==References== ==External links== * https://www.facebook.com/pages/Chandpur-Childrens-Academy/1380768888836238 Category:Primary schools in West Bengal Category:High schools and secondary schools in West Bengal Category:Schools in Malda district Category:Educational institutions established in 1995 Category:1995 establishments in India
title: Chandpur Children's Academy
